title: The Secret Android Button
description: Other Android button video -  The Pressy is around $10 -   Physical buttons for your smartphone are a cool concept. This is the Pressy button for Android. It uses the headphone jack to hijack certain phone functions.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
